title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XIII, pt. 5005 - Compromises Under Subdivision Fifteenth Of Section 171 Of The Tax Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XIII, pt. 5005 - Compromises Under Subdivision Fifteenth Of Section 171 Of The Tax Law

State Regulations
§ 5005.1 - Offers in compromise of fixed and final tax liabilities

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XIII, pt. 5005

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 1096[a]; L. 2011, ch. 469

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
